thread.section_title: SAG Awards 2017 Winners, News and Red Carpet Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Sophie Turner slips into abs-flashing crop top
thread.title_full: Sophie Turner slips into abs-flashing crop top | Daily Mail Online

author: Ciara Farmer For Mailonline
title: Sophie Turner slips into abs-flashing crop top
text:
On the SAG Awards red carpet, she opted for retro Hollywood glamour.
Yet Sophie Turner proved just how versatile her fashion choices are as she transformed into an abs-flashing sweatshirt with jeans for the HBO after-party held at celeb hot spot Catch LA in West Hollywood on Sunday night.
The 20-year-old Game Of Thrones actress flashed her incredibly taut abs in the edgy ensemble, which was worlds away from her earlier look of a floor-sweeping red gown with a racy split.
Strutting her stuff: Sophie Turner proved just how versatile her fashion choices are as she transformed into an abs-flashing sweatshirt with jeans for the HBO after party held at celeb hot spot Catch LA in West Hollywood on Sunday night
Sophie was in the minority of stars who changed after the awards, yet she ensured she looked sensational in both her on and off duty looks.
Her cropped sweatshirt sloped off her shoulders in style and boasted a black and purple colour scheme - although the scanty material and perilous placement meant the blonde beauty was at risk of baring all.
The stunning star proved there was not an inch to pinch on her slender waist as she slipped into eye-wateringly tight black jeans, with the waistband sitting above her waist in height.
After rocking a custom-made Louis Vuitton gown earlier in the night, she gave yet another nod to the fashion giant with a monogrammed belt, adorned with the LV logo, cinching in her tiny waist.
Who's that girl? The 20-year-old Game Of Thrones actress flashed her incredibly taut abs in the edgy ensemble, which was worlds away from her earlier look of a floor-sweeping red gown with a racy split
Rocking it! Sophie was in the minority of stars who changed after the awards, yet she ensured she looked sensational in both her on and off duty looks
Wear it off shoulder like Sophie Turner Sophie's off shoulder crop zip top
Top of the crops!
Sophie Turner stepped out on the red carpet at the SAG Awards this weekend in a stunning red gown that oozed serious Hollywood glamour.
At the HBO after-party at Catch in Los Angeles though, the actress decided to change into something a little less fancy and a little bit cooler.
Sophie chose a pair of skinny jeans for the event paired with a crop top that showed off her ridiculously tiny waist. She had added a box clutch and belt by Louis Vuitton too and finished the look with Christian Louboutin pointed pumps.
The top really caught our eye. We loved the on-trend off-shoulder detailing and the zip up front that made it half top/half jacket. The black and royal blue design really popped and it contrasted with Sophie's slick of red lippy that secured her stylish status.
If you're keen to nab something like it, see below for an array of similar off shoulder crop tops up for grabs from around the web.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET ONE LIKE IT £16 Asos Tall cardigan in fine knit off shoulder shape
Buy now

Buy now
Adding a further edgy feel to the look, Sophie sported a unique take on the classic court shoe as the entire body of the footwear was mesh.
Injecting a glamorous hint into the otherwise sports luxe style, she clutched a no-doubt designer silver clutch with a boxy shape.
While her look was transformed, she kept her hair and make-up the same with a bold crimson lipstick contrasting with her alabaster skin and her hair in pin curls.
Look at me! Her cropped sweatshirt sloped off her shoulders in style and boasted a black and purple colour scheme - although the scanty material and perilous placement meant the blonde beauty was at risk of baring all
Earlier in the day her look was totally different as she trod the red carpet at the ceremony, held at Los Angeles' Shrine Auditorium
She looked phenomenal in her stunning red gown, which boasted with an asymmetric detail and a racy split extending the length of the leg.
Sophie looked her very best at the star-studded bash as she slipped into her one shouldered red gown, which flashed a cheeky hint of cleavage.
Lady in red: Earlier in the day her look was totally different as she trod the red carpet at the ceremony, held at Los Angeles' Shrine Auditorium
The floor-sweeping crimson dress boasted a cleavage boosting top, with one thin strap and another thick number extending over her other shoulder.
She added in a racy split extending the length of her long, lithe legs, which she boosted with the addition of dazzling gold heels.
Injecting further Hollywood glam into the ensemble, she wore diamond earrings with a slight drop protruding from her flowing locks.
Beaming beauty: Sophie ensured she looked her very best at the star-studded bash as she slipped into her one shouldered red gown, which flashed a cheeky hint of cleavage
Having soared to fame with trademark flame red tresses, she dyed her hair bold blonde last year - a colour which perfectly complemented Sunday's look.
Ensuring her beauty regimen was meshed with the style of her gown, she wore her long locks in the Twenties-inspired curls that she maintained later on.
Her lipstick appeared to be custom designed for her ensemble, as the bold crimson shade was perfectly offset against her gown.
Blonde beauty: Having soared to fame with trademark flame red tresses, she dyed her hair bold blonde last year - a colour which perfectly complemented Sunday's look
Red wonder: Ensuring her beauty regimen was meshed with the style of her gown, she wore her long locks in Twenties-inspired pin curls
Sophie was flying the flag for the HBO show as the the cast of Game of Thrones were nominated for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series.
Joining her at the do, was her GOT colleague Maisie Williams, with whom she shares such a strong bond, that they have been dubbed 'Mophie'.
And Maisie revealed she's so close to co-star Sophie Turner that she considers her as a 'sister'. Speaking on This Morning, the 19-year-old actress was full of praise for her friend as she discussed landing such a major role so young.
The starlet plays Arya Stark on Game Of Thrones, whilst Sophie plays her on-screen sister, Sansa.
Slinky: Joining her at the do, was her GOT colleague Maisie Williams, with whom she shares such a strong bond, that they have been dubbed 'Mophie'
Pretty in pink: Discussing their friendship, Maisie said: 'It was so wonderful to have someone my age plucked out from normality into this world. It’s really lovely to have someone to hold my hand through this. She’s like my big sister'
Discussing their friendship, Maisie said: 'It was so wonderful to have someone my age plucked out from normality into this world. It’s really lovely to have someone to hold my hand through this. She’s like my big sister.'
As Holly Willoughby remarked that it was lovely to see the pair together on the red carpet at the Golden Globes, Maisie agreed.
She explained: 'It gets pretty scary and it’s lovely to have her there.' The pair no doubt have plenty in common as they both made their professional acting debut at a young age on the HBO series.
